{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = WRT1900ACS 01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC1900 Dual-Band Smart Wi-Fi Wireless Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-WRT1900ACS/ |sp = http://support.linksys.com/us/support-product?pid=01t34000003qSgQAAU |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |wikidevi = Linksys_WRT1900ACS |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Not Supported --> |gargoylesupport = Supported
|brand = Linksys |model = WRT1900AC |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = S |revision = v1 |subrevision = (shelby) |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/08/2015 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Linksys_WRT1900ACS |wlclass = AC1900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q87-WRT1900ACV2 |icid = 3839A-WRT1900ACV2 |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F6820;88F6820-A0, C160, Armada 385; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARMv7 |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 1.6 GHz <!-- 1.6 / 1.8 / 2.0 GHz (1.33 GHz) --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML01G100TFI00; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G63FFR-PBC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Marvell;88E6172; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 / eSATA (combo port) |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 6-pin header,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = no fan |addchip = USB 3.0 Host Controller;EtronTech;EJ168A;;1; ,,, 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 2.4GHz SPDT switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85201;;4; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5522;;4; ,,, 5GHz SPDT switch w/ LNA;Skyworks;SKY85601;;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, Gargoyle, LEDE Project, OpenWrt
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 03/20/2015 |estreldate = 10/07/2015 |reldate = <!-- Release date --> |estprice = 229.99 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAB2753F0077 |asin = B014MIBLSA |asin_country = US |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Marvell;88W8864; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1300 |nqam1 = 600 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Marvell;88W8864; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL,RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 600 |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== Linksys WRT1900ACS (Shelby) :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820-A0 C160 @1.6GHz (Armada 385) :Flash: 128MB (NAND), RAM: 512MB (DDR3) {{FCC ST|06/30/2015}} [[Linksys WRT1900AC v2]] (Cobra) *[http://www.linksys.com/ca/support-article?articleNum=143610 ''Getting to know the Linksys WRT1900AC'' on '''Linksys'''] :[[Linksys WRT1900AC]] v1 (Mamba) - Dual Core @1.2GHz CPU ::CPU: [[Marvell]] MV78230; MV78230-B0 C120 @1.2GHz (Armada XP) :[[Linksys WRT1900AC v2]] (Cobra) - Dual-Core @1.3GHz CPU ::CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820; 88F6820-A0 C133 @1.33GHz (Armada 385) *[http://www.linksys.com/ru/support-article?articleNum=156194 Product comparison between ''Linksys WRT1900AC and WRT1900AC v2''] :CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6820 C133 @1.33MHz (C160 @1.6GHz FCC images) :Uses a 12V 3A power adapter <small> :According to the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3040357 Description of Change] document at the FCC, the following models :are electrically identical. Different model names are for marketing purposes. *WRT1900ACS, WRT1900ACSV2, WRT1900ACS V2 :The [[Linksys WRT1900AC v2]] should also have identical components but possibly :different cooling setups.</small>
==Links of Interest== ===Wikis=== *{{WPLink|Linksys_routers#WRT1900AC}} *[https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt_ac_series On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki] :[https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt_ac_series#wrt1900acs WRT1900ACS] - [[Marvell]] Armada 385 @1.6GHz (Shelby)
===Notices=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-news/32855-linksys-announces-the-wrt1900acs ''Linksys Announces The WRT1900ACS'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.cnet.com/products/linksys-wrt1900acs-dual-band-gigabit-wi-fi-router/ ''Linksys WRT1900ACS Dual Band Gigabit Router'' on '''C|Net'''] *[http://betanews.com/2015/10/07/linksys-linux-wrt1900acs-router-open-source/ ''Linksys unveils Linux-powered WRT1900ACS router'' on '''BetaNews''']
===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32856-linksys-wrt1900acs-dual-band-gigabit-router-reviewed ''Linksys WRT1900ACS Gigabit Router Reviewed'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[http://www.pcworld.com/article/2990486/home-networking/linksys-wrt1900acs-review-the-best-router-for-most-router-enthusiasts.html ''Linksys WRT1900ACS Dual Band Gigabit Router Review'' on '''PCWorld'''] *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32393-linksys-wrt1900ac-ac1900-dual-band-wireless-router-review Review ''Linksys WRT1900AC v1'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ([http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32400-linksys-wrt1900ac-review-more-tests + more tests]) *[https://ipon.eu/elemzesek/linksys_wrt1900ac_a_negyantennas_802.11ac_router/2124/2 Review ''Linksys WRT1900AC'' on '''iPon'''] ([https://ipon.hu/_userfiles/Image/joker/linksys/wrt1900ac/szoftver/marvell01.png MV78230 Spec], PCB images)
===Forum threads=== *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=50173&p=322 ''Update on Linksys WRT1900AC support'' on '''OpenWrt''' forums] (Kaloz) :Support for the WRT1900ACS (Shelby) is available in CC and trunk *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/linksys-wrt-1900acs.27516/ ''Linksys WRT1900ACS'' on '''SNB''' forums] (RMerlin)
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = wrt1900acs build 28015 20151023 :[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Linksys_WRT1900AC Install Guide] :You must flash an older image and then upgrade via web to a newer image, if the firmware image is over 30MB it will not work from stock firmware.
===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/linksys/linksys_wrt1900acs_v1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt1900acs |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=61904 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = mvebu |subtarget = cortexa9 |arch = arm_cortex-a9_vfpv3 |support_started_version = 15.05 |current_supported_version = 23.05.4 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
